Linkwarden.description:
A self-hosted, open-source collaborative bookmark manager for organizing and archiving webpages.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

3000.description: The port for accessing the Linkwarden Web UI.
3000.label: Web UI Port

/data/data.description: Choose a Share for Linkwarden data storage. E.g., create a share named linkwarden-data.
/data/data.label: Linkwarden Data Storage

NEXTAUTH_SECRET.description: Set an alphanumeric secret phrase for Linkwarden's authentication mechanism. This is not a user password but internal to Linkwarden.
NEXTAUTH_SECRET.label: Linkwarden Secret

NEXTAUTH_URL.description: Base URL for Linkwarden. Set to: http://<Rockstor IP address or server name>:<Web UI port defined earlier>/api/v1/auth
NEXTAUTH_URL.label: Linkwarden Base URL

/var/lib/postgresql/data.description: Choose a Share for PostgreSQL database storage.
/var/lib/postgresql/data.label: PostgreSQL Storage

POSTGRES_PASSWORD.description: Enter the password for the PostgreSQL 'postgres' super-user that was entered previously as part of the 'PostgreSQL URL'
POSTGRES_PASSWORD.label: PostgreSQL Password
